Name: Prism
About the game: Prism Plus Video File Converter is a ultra-fast, easy-to-use video converter for Windows. Whether you are looking to convert avi to mp4, avi to mov, or vob to wmv, Prism gives you the flexibility to convert both the popular and hard to find file formats. Prism converts in three easy steps. Simply choose the files you wish to convert, select the output folder and file format you desire and click Convert! Some Prism Features Include: Drag and drop video files directly into the Prism interface for convenience. Extract video directly from DVDs. Preview video files before conversion with the video previewer screen. Add video effects, like text overlay. Edit your videos before conversion by correcting its orientation. Include a watermark for to protect your video. Adjust video settings, such as compression/encoder rates, resolution and frame rates. Customize file sizes of various output files. Use batch conversion to apply effects and settings and convert all at one time to specified files. Some File Formats Include: .3gp, .asf, .avi, .divx, .dv, .flv, .m4v, .mkv, .mod, .mov, .mp4, .mpe, .mpeg, .mpg, .ogv, .vob, .webm, .wmv and many more.
